objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#EAF2F8;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D4E6F1;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#3498DB;stop-opacity:0.2'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#85C1E9;stop-opacity:0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#3498DB' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><rect x='90' y='90' width='900' height='900' rx='20' stroke='#3498DB' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='350' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='250' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M200 60 C300 30, 400 90, 500 60 C600 30, 700 90, 800 60 C900 30, 1000 90, 1100 60' stroke='#3498DB' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M200 1020 C300 990, 400 1050, 500 1020 C600 990, 700 1050, 800 1020 C900 990, 1000 1050, 1100 1020' stroke='#3498DB' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M200 200 L880 200 L880 880 L200 880 Z' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.5' rx='15' ry='15'/></svg>

objects.text:
Captures Lint, Hair & Pet Dander
Neutralizes Odors & Smoke
Portable Design for Any Room
Ultra-Quiet Operation (25-44dB)

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout showcasing an air purifier product. The header text layer (`heading`) is prominently displayed at the top in a large, futuristic sans-serif font. Just beneath it, a secondary text layer (`subheading`) highlights the product’s main feature in bold capital letters. A smaller paragraph-style text block (`description`) lists product benefits in bullet-point format. The price text (`price`) is bold and large near the lower left, capturing attention quickly. A rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with layered text (`cta`) invites the user to shop. The product image (`product_image`) is placed prominently on the right. The background (`background`) features layered gradients and soft abstract waves to create visual depth without distraction.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #1A5276 (header, price)
- Soft Sky Blue: #3498DB (button, strokes)
- Light Steel Blue: #85C1E9 (gradient overlay)
- White: #FFFFFF (background, button text)
- Deep Gray: #34495E (description text)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, minimalistic air purifier dominated by a cool-toned, neutral color palette. The main color is a clean white (#FFFFFF), representing purity and cleanliness, complemented by a dark gray top grille (#4D4D4D), adding contrast and a modern aesthetic. Subtle light gray accents (#D9D9D9) are used for the logo and background perforations, contributing to a soft, cohesive look. The touch panel includes hints of blue (#3C9DFF) and red (#FF3B30) LEDs that inject vibrancy without overwhelming the design. For an advertisement banner, using white, dark gray, light gray, soft blue, and red can maintain elegance while highlighting key features.
